name: Movies Based on TV Shows Trivia Quiz | They Became Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who played Miss Hathaway in the big screen version of "The Beverly Hillbillies"?
questions.explanation:
Lily Tomlin.

	Lily did a fabulous job as the nutty banker's assistant.

questions.text: Which TV based movie starred Mel Gibson and Jodie Foster?
questions.explanation:
Maverick.

	James Garner, the original Maverick, co-starred as Mel's father.

questions.text: Which country singer has a cameo in "The Little Rascals Movie"?
questions.explanation:
Reba McEntire.

	Reba played a racecar driver that the gang really admired until they found out she was a girl!

questions.text: Where did the Bradys go on in "A Very Brady Sequel"?
What was the title of the second "Addams Family" film?
questions.explanation:
Addams Family Values.

	The second film in the big screen series.

questions.text: Who plays the title character of Wayne in "Wayne's World"?
questions.explanation:
Mike Myers.

	Myers played Wayne and Dana Carvey played Garth in this big screen version of a former "Saturday Night Live" skit.

questions.text: Leslie Nielsen starred in this big screen version of "Police Squad".
questions.explanation:
The Naked Gun & Naked Gun.

	"The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!" is the complete title of this comedy flick.

questions.text: Who played Fred Flintstone in the film "The Flintstones"?
questions.explanation:
John Goodman & Goodman.

	John took the lead role.  Also starring were Rick Moranis and Rosie O'Donnell.

questions.text: The subtitle of this animated film is "Bigger, Longer and Uncut".
questions.explanation:
South Park & south park movie.

	The "Comedy Central" series "South Park" hits the silver screen.

questions.text: Who played Jim West in "Wild Wild West"?
questions.explanation:
Will Smith & Smith.

	Will made that tv show into a blockbuster hit.
